page.title: 18AN IMAGINARY NEWSPAPER.
page.content:
"THE BARTON REWARDER" 17 July 1985
{FROZEN GREENHOUSE BLOSSOMING A mini album entitled "Underglass" has been released by three Barton teenagers,namely,Kim Appleyard,Theresa Kemp and Clare Pearson.It is their first recording made and sounds as if it could be a sucess."Underglass" is available from Pegasus Records,a new shop opened on Fleetgate,Barton. The group may be helped by the fact that Theresa's father is a member of the well known folk group "Steeleye Span" {LIONS AT PET SHOW A garden party and pet show held on Sunday 14th July ,at Marsh Lane football ground raised Â£160. for the Barton Scout fund.The Vice-President of the Lions opened the garden party.
